txt.en: 'What we accomplished today is a thing of which legends are made -- \qThe Song of Slade and [placeholder] at Ost Cyrn,\q if you like!\n\n'Are you ready to return to Ost Guruth? Perhaps I'll find a minstrel to whom I can relate this tale!'

'Ost Cyrn lies ahead, [placeholder], and if we are true of heart and strong of arm, the Orcs within will not remain there by this time tomorrow!\n\n'Let us take a circuitous route into the ruins and slay as many Orcs as lie within our path. Mosal-ruk will test our courage even by himself, and the fewer of his band that remain when we face him, the more confident I will be of our victory!'
Instance: A Champion's Courage

'Let us continue, [placeholder] -- the deadliest leg of our journey lies ahead, for Mosal-ruk has surely learned of our coming by now. We will show him he and his kind are not welcome in these lands!'
Slade Ransford has been defeated
Slade Ransford has been defeated
Mosal-ruk has triumphed
Slade Ransford is at Ost Cyrn, in the Lone-lands.\n\nSlade is waiting to speak with you about fighting deep into Ost Cyrn in search of Mosal-ruk, the vile Orc that leads this war-band.

Slade Ransford is at Ost Cyrn, in the Lone-lands.\n\nSlade is taking a quick rest atop one of the ruined buildings of Ost Cyrn, and is waiting to speak with you about proceeding further into the ruins in search of Mosal-ruk.
Mosal-ruk stands defiantly before you.\n\nYou have fought deep into Ost Cyrn with Slade Ransford, and the time has come to face Mosal-ruk, the leader of the war-band that occupies the ruins.
Slade Ransford stands triumphantly within Ost Cyrn.\n\nTogether, you and Slade journeyed into the ruins of Ost Cyrn and put an end to Mosal-ruk and his vile war-band.
'Death to the Orcs!'
'Get back up here, [placeholder]! I can't do this alone!'
Talk to Slade Ransford
Fight into Ost Cyrn with Slade Ransford
Talk to Slade Ransford
Fight into Ost Cyrn with Slade Ransford
Defy Mosal-ruk
Defeat Mosal-ruk and the remains of his war-band
Talk to Slade Ransford
'Champions? You make me laugh, weaklings! Now you die!'
You have come to Ost Cyrn with Slade Ransford to cast out the Orcs that have taken up residence within the ruins.
'Mosal-ruk must be further inside. Let's rest for a bit.'
'Look! It's him!'
'Mosal-ruk! Your time in this place is up!'

'We are victorious, [placeholder], true champions of the Lone-lands! Mosal-ruk will no more threaten the folk who try to make their living in these hard lands, and we have sent a message to his masters this day -- we will stand against you, no matter the odds!\n\n'Tell me when you are ready, and we will journey back to Ost Guruth with this happy news!'
